overview:
Angie (Yinzhi) Yuan serves as the Director of Marketing at GageIn and is responsible for marketing-including brand identity, social media, customer development, public relations and community success. Prior to GageIn, Angie successfully advised several early-stage startup companies in the fields of SaaS, business services and software on their go-to-market strategies and prepared them for due diligence in Silicon Valley. Before that, Angie was a Business Development Manager at InfoUSA, a leading provider in data and records management and marketing solutions, focusing on partnership development and revenue generation for its subscription-based sales lead generation tool.

Angie has a great passion for new product development and launch, and has significant marketing and product management experience for business applications and Internet services. She holds an MBA degree from State University of New York at Albany, and a Bachelor’s degree from Fudan University in Shanghai.
